item.title: Installing PIL on Mac OSX Mavericks
item.description: If you’ve probably tried installing PIL(Python Imaging Library) on OSX Mavericks(version 10.9), you’re likely to have failed in doing so. After searching for a while, I found the solution that worked for me.
